name: blocklist_de-feed
label: Blocklist.de Feed
description: Blocklist.de is a free and voluntary service provided by a Fraud/Abuse-specialist, whose servers are often attacked via SSH-, Mail-Login-, FTP-, Webserver- and other services. This connector facilitates automated operations related to fetching the list of blocklisted IP addresses of services and ingestion of daily threat feeds. This connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Review the server URL of the Blocklist.de Feed Security server to which you will connect and retrieve data.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.

operations.title: Fetch Indicators
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all IP addresses from Blocklist.de Feed that are added after the time you have specified. Defaults to the IP addresses added in the last 48 hours.

parameters.title: Added After
parameters.name: time
parameters.tooltip: To get only the last added IP-Addresses. Default: last 48 hours
parameters.description: Specify the DateTime after which you want to retrieve the IP addresses from Blocklist.de Feed.

parameters.title: Service Type
parameters.name: service
parameters.description: Select the service type for which you want to retrieve the service block listed IP addresses from Blocklist.de Feed. You can choose between SSH, Mail, Apache, IMAP, FTP, Bots, and VOIP. If you do not select a service type then IP addresses for all services are retrieved from Blocklist.de Feed.

parameters.title: Process Response As
parameters.name: output_mode
options: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.tooltip: Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being created as "Feed records" in FortiSOAR (the Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR option) or data being returned in the JSON format (the Return as a JSON option).
parameters.description:
Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being created as "Feed records" in FortiSOAR (the Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR option) or data being returned in the JSON format (the Return as a JSON option). 
If you choose the 'Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR' option, then in the Record Creation Playbook IRI field, specify the IRI of the playbook that creates feed records in FortiSOAR.

Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.title: Record Creation Playbook IRI
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.description: Specify the IRI of the playbook that creates feed records in FortiSOAR.
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.name: create_pb_id

operations.title: Fetch All Blocklist IPs
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all IP addresses that are having run attacks on the service from Blocklist.de

parameters.title: Service Type
parameters.name: service
parameters.description: Select the service type for which you want to retrieve the service block listed IP addresses from Blocklist.de Feed. You can choose between All, SSH, Mail, Apache, IMAP, FTP, SIP, IRC Bot, Bots, Strong IPs, and Brute Force Login. By default, this is set as Bots

parameters.title: Process Response As
parameters.name: output_mode
options: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.tooltip: Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being created as "Feed records" in FortiSOAR (the Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR option) or data being returned in the JSON format (the Return as a JSON option).
parameters.description:
Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being created as "Feed records" in FortiSOAR (the Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR option) or data being returned in the JSON format (the Return as a JSON option). 
If you choose the 'Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR' option, then in the Record Creation Playbook IRI field, specify the IRI of the playbook that creates feed records in FortiSOAR

Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.title: Record Creation Playbook IRI
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.description: Specify the IRI of the playbook that creates feed records in FortiSOAR.
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.name: create_pb_id
